title: Which SpiderMan protagonist would you be ?

options.name: Funny person, but very childish every now and then
Someone who tries to act cool, but is actually very shy
Someone who doesn't like to give up on anything
Someone who's made quite a few mistakes, but always try to improve
Grilfriend
Everyone I could
I don't know
Everyone, literally everyone

questions.question: What's the number one thing you worry about when facing something really tough to beat ?

options.name: Play mind games by telling witty jokes
I mock my opponent, but I frquently find out the best solution
I try to be persuasive while distracting my opponent but I'm actually freaking out
Try to figure out the best way to beat it
Balance my career and spend some quality time with the one I love
If anything, I'm lost
Love, family and helping people
Try to not give up on anything I love

questions.question: What would be the nickname that best defines you ?

options.name: Brat
Tiger
Crybaby
Rebel

T: You'd be Tom Holland's SpiderMan version!
B: You'd be Tobey Maguire's SpiderMan version
G: You'd be Andrew Garfield's SpiderMan version!
